ConsoleCommand.Description: Deletes cache items created by KIX.

Parameters.Description: Delete only caches which are expired by TTL.
Parameters.Name: expired

Parameters.Description: Define the type of cache which should be deleted (e.g. Ticket or StdAttachment).
Parameters.Name: type

Parameters.Description: Do not perform ANSI terminal output coloring.
Parameters.Name: no-ansi

Parameters.Description: Suppress informative output, only retain error messages.
Parameters.Name: quiet

Event.Description: An array of events that should trigger the execution of the job.

ExecPlanType.Description: Allows a time based execution of automation jobs. At least one weekday and time must be configured.
ExecPlanType.Name: TimeBased

Time.Description: An array of times when the job should be executed on every configured weekday.
Time.Name: Time

Weekday.Description: An array of weekdays (Mon,Tue,Wed,Thu,Fri,Sat,Sun) when the job should be executed.
Weekday.Name: Weekday

de.Body:
Hallo <KIX_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_UserFirstname> <KIX_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_UserLastname>,

die Erinnerungszeit für das gesperrte Ticket [<KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::Hook><KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::HookDivider><KIX_TICKET_TicketNumber>] wurde erreicht.

<KIX_CONFIG_HttpType>://<KIX_CONFIG_FQDN>/<KIX_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentTicketZoom;TicketID=<KIX_TICKET_TicketID>

-- <KIX_CONFIG_NotificationSenderName>
de.Subject: Erinnerungszeit des gesperrten Tickets erreicht: <KIX_TICKET_Title>

en.Body:
Hi <KIX_NOTIFICATION_RECIPIENT_UserFirstname>,

the pending reminder time of the locked ticket [<KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::Hook><KIX_CONFIG_Ticket::HookDivider><KIX_TICKET_TicketNumber>] has been reached.

<KIX_CONFIG_HttpType>://<KIX_CONFIG_FQDN>/<KIX_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentTicketZoom;TicketID=<KIX_TICKET_TicketID>

-- <KIX_CONFIG_NotificationSenderName>
en.Subject: Locked Ticket Pending Reminder Time Reached: <KIX_TICKET_Title>
